title: res插件怎么设置传送时间？
author: 阿狸哥哥
txt_content: res tp 怎么设置不秒传，设置时间要怎么弄

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
config中找到
  Tp:
    # The interval, in seconds, for teleportation.
    # Use 0 to disable
    TeleportDelay: 3
    # Show aditional message in title message area when player is teleporting to residence
    TeleportTitleMessage: true复制代码

TeleportDelay就是传送需要等待的时间 单位秒
